video_caption: The video features a woman in a light pink turtleneck sweater seated against a black background, with the text "PRETTY BIG DEAL" in red at the bottom left corner. She appears to be speaking, as her mouth moves and her head slightly shifts. The scene transitions to another woman with long, dark hair tied in a ponytail, wearing a black sleeveless top, sitting in front of a laptop on a couch with a plant in the background. The text "PRETTY BIG DEAL" remains visible in the bottom left corner. The video alternates between these two women, with the first woman continuing to speak and the second woman looking at her laptop screen. The video concludes with a title card displaying "PRETTY BIG DEAL WITH ASHLEY GRAHAM" in bold red and black letters on a white background.
